p: Effect of Z. armatum leaves extract (ZAL) and a total crude fraction (ZALA) on pyrexia induced body temperature in mice is presented in Table 1. The maximum effect of ZAL was with 300 mg/kg dose and was significant (p < 0.01) at 5 h time. Similarly, ZALA showed significant results (p < 0.001) at 100 mg/kg dose and was equipotent with Paracetamol used as standard drug.
